summary.span: 表示以直观丰富的格式显示一组相关项或一组命令的菜单，该菜单可分组为多种类别的子菜单。

span.span: Represents a menu that displays a set of related items or commands in a visually rich format that can be organized into multiple categorized subsets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如下图所示承载一个简单。The following illustration shows a hosting a simple . ![功能区下拉组合框控件-下打开](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "功能区下拉列表打开组合框控件")![Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open") 组合框中的功能区库Ribbon gallery in a combo box ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建托管的组合框的标记具有三个可用的项目。The following example shows the markup to create a combo box that hosts a with three available items. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonComboBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribboncombobox)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每个功能区控件继承属性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果设置属性，则不会显示功能区的增强的工具提示; 将改为显示标准工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
